item.source: How to change server name and upload it so people can download

item.title: How to change server name and upload it so people can download
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

If you really want to make it hard to edit, I suggest using jShrink, and shrinking all the class files, then deleting the java’s. Then use JARmaker to jar the files. Finally, you’re going to want to use Jar2Exe, to add the client to an exe file.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change server name and upload it so people can download

item.title: How to change server name and upload it so people can download
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

[quote=“GrimReapersScythe, post:4, topic:308221”][quote author=Trent!! link=topic=404352.msg2992984#msg2992984 date=1255392666]
go through everything, and search the name that is showing up. and replace it with yours.

then, with your client, MAKE A COPY OF YOUR CLIENT FOLDER.

with one copy, make the txt files read only or delete them, and hide all folders, and delete the compiler. compress this folder using winRAR then upload it on uppit or megaupload… or one of the known upload sites.

the other copy is so you can continue to edit everything.

[/quote]
Deleting Java text files, only stops people from editing them without a Java Decompiler, which most people on these forums have. Also, making the files read only does nothing as anyone can undo this. And thirdly, hiding folders won’t really do anything, as about 99.9% of people have their computers to show hidden files.[/quote]

true

Read full topic
item.source: How to change server name and upload it so people can download

item.title: How to change server name and upload it so people can download
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:3, topic:308221”]go through everything, and search the name that is showing up. and replace it with yours.

then, with your client, MAKE A COPY OF YOUR CLIENT FOLDER.

with one copy, make the txt files read only or delete them, and hide all folders, and delete the compiler. compress this folder using winRAR then upload it on uppit or megaupload… or one of the known upload sites.

the other copy is so you can continue to edit everything.[/quote]
Deleting Java text files, only stops people from editing them without a Java Decompiler, which most people on these forums have. Also, making the files read only does nothing as anyone can undo this. And thirdly, hiding folders won’t really do anything, as about 99.9% of people have their computers to show hidden files.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change server name and upload it so people can download
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Open client.java and search for the previous name. Change it to the name you want it you be. Also do this is texthandler.java, as some servers use it to load the quest tab.

Read full topic
